IonoObservationPhase_Abridged.description: /// Multi-dimensional array with the same dimensions as power plus one additional dimension for antenna_element (where each array element corresponds to a single antenna element). This variable is enabled for post-process polarization and/or antenna array determination. Note: this phase_array can be combined with power_array or amplitude_array to create a phasor.

notes.description:
Notes for the phase data. Orientation and position for each antenna element across the antenna_element dimension.
Example: /// Example: NOTES
Constraints: Minimum length = 0, Maximum length = 512

dimensions.description:
Array of integers of the phase array dimensions.
Example: /// Example: [1, 2]
Constraints: No constraints specified.

dimensionName.description:
Array of names for phase dimensions.
Example: /// Example: ['NAME1', 'NAME2']
Constraints: No constraints specified.

data.description:
Array of phase data.
Example: /// Example: [[[[[[[0.02, 0.034]]]]]]]
Constraints: No constraints specified.
